sense.gloss: receiver of technique (e.g. in martial arts)
bottom (submissive partner of a homosexual relationship)
to be struck by (wind, waves, sunlight, etc.)
to sustain (damage), to incur (a loss), to suffer (an injury), to feel (influence)
to undergo (e.g. surgery), to take (a test), to accept (a challenge)
to find funny, to find humorous, to be amused (by)
to follow, to succeed, to be descended from
to obtain (a pawned item, etc.) by paying a fee
to be well-received, to become popular, to go down well
acceptance, consent, assent, agreement, compliance, acknowledgment, acknowledgement
recognition, acknowledgement, acknowledgment, approval, consent, agreement
handing down (information), legend, tradition, folklore, transmission
second line of a four-line Chinese poem

sdata.j: ↑沈黙↑↓ちんもく↓は↑承諾↑↓しょうだく↓の↑印↑↓しるし↓。
あなたのプランを↑承認↑↓しょうにん↓します。
↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑行↑↓い↓ってもらわねば↑承知↑↓しょうち↓しない。
sdata.e: I'm adamant that you should go.

sdata.j: ↑伝言↑↓でんごん↓を↑承↑↓うけたまわ↓りましょうか。
sdata.e: Would you like to leave a message?

sdata.j: ↑王子↑↓おうじ↓が↑王位↑↓おうい↓を↑継承↑↓けいしょう↓した。
sdata.e: The prince succeeded to the throne.

sdata.j: ↑英国↑↓えいこく↓↑人↑↓じん↓は↑自由↑↓じゆう↓の↑継承↑↓けいしょう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓である。
sdata.e: Englishmen are the heirs of liberty.

sdata.j: ↑委員↑↓いいん↓↑会↑↓かい↓は↑予算↑↓よさん↓↑案↑↓あん↓を↑承認↑↓しょうにん↓した。
sdata.e: The committee approved the draft budget.

sdata.j: ↑委員↑↓いいん↓↑会↑↓かい↓は↑予算↑↓よさん↓を↑承認↑↓しょうにん↓した。
よろしい。お↑申↑↓もう↓し↑出↑↓で↓は↑承知↑↓しょうち↓しました。
sdata.e: All right. I'll accept your offer.

sdata.j: みんなその↑計画↑↓けいかく↓を↑承認↑↓しょうにん↓した。
sdata.e: All of us approved of the plan.
